name: Starlights / 별빛 아래
description:
Starlights is currently only available in Korean. English version of the game is currently in development.

Starlights is a visual novel focusing on the character Fletcher. It tells a story of a protagonist who had to move schools because of an unforeseen circumstance. At the new school, he meets Fletcher, his roommate, and the story between Fletcher and the protagonist begins.

Would our protagonist develop feeling toward Fletcher? What exactly is it that he’s feeling? Play Starlights to find out!

Features

  • Handcrafted event CG artworks.
  • Three different club routes to choose from.
  • Immersive storyline.
  • Cute furry characters.

Note: Starlights features same-sex romance and relationship.
